participant_2.background:
I love the feeling of a job well done, and I find it really rewarding to cook delicious food for people.
I decided to write my own songs to challenge myself and to pursue my passion for music.
my favorite band is the beatles.
I work hard and save money for my future.
I love the color green because it is calming and peaceful, which is something I need after a long day with my toddler.

content.text: What is your favorite thing to do in your free time?
I enjoy cooking for my family and friends. I love the feeling of a job well done and I find it really rewarding to cook delicious food for people.
That's awesome! I love cooking too. I love the process of creating a delicious meal and sharing it with others.
What is your favorite thing to cook?
I love making pasta dishes. I'm also a big fan of baking. I love the smell of fresh-baked bread in the house.

I love baking too! I love creating new recipes and trying new flavors. I have a toddler and the color green is her favorite color. It is so calming and peaceful, which is something I need after a long day with her.
That's so sweet! I love that you have such a close bond with your daughter.
Thanks! I am glad that she enjoys the color green as much as I do.
What is your favorite thing about your job?
I love that I get to be creative and that I get to meet new people. I also love the feeling of accomplishment when I finish a project.
Those are all great things! I am glad that you enjoy your job.
Thanks! I am very lucky to have found a job that I love.
Me too! I love being able to do something that I am passionate about.
